name: The Sweet Escape (Wannibe Manisha)
description:
Help Vic Sprinkle, the infamous donut thief, make his grand escape! 

Every time you move, the police move. The police can see up to 2 squares forward and follow a specific route. Make your way out of the donut shop without getting caught!

Play full screen for best experience! (Some of the lighting seems to be messed up on the web version, download if you have any problems)

Credits
